name: Nano (Code Master 2209)
description:
An amazing zombie game made in Scratch ported over to html

Version history

Version 0.8.6 Beta - Base Game
Modes:
Endless
Endless Waves

Cool stuff:
Player becomes a zombie after infection.
Zombie data changes each wave

Version 0.9.0 Beta - Menu Update

Added:
Better menu
Bugfix

Version 0.9.1 Beta - Big Bugfix

Added Coming soon button
Updated credits
Removed unneeded files

Fixed:
Pausing while in menu screen
Music not working
Zombies running in to a wall
Player not shooting while next to a wall
Effect over thumbnail
Loading buttons Infront of loading screen
Intro braking
Version var not showing right version

Version 1.0.0 Beta - The release update - Latest

Added:
Main Menu button in pause screen

Fixed:
Bug with menu showing in game
Wave counter
Error not loading Bullets
